item.description:
St Patricks Day is coming what better way to get in the spirit than this venue!
meet in lobby at 5:10, this will fill fast, so try to get there early to get a seat. Maybe coffee or other after the show?

Alasdair Fraser and Natalie Haas
at The Yale Center for British Arts
FREE

Scottish fiddle and pipe tunes by master fiddler Alasdair Fraser with Natalie Haas on the cello.
Fraser appears in his favoured current pairing with the young American cellist Natalie Haas, continuing to pursue their resurrection and reinvention of the classic musical marriage between big and small fiddles, a familiar feature of Scottish music in the 18th century. The duo’s near-telepathic interplay is dazzling both for its breathtaking technical prowess and its boundless dynamism, be it in tunes from that same golden era, the age of Burns and Gow, or Fraser’s own memorable compositions.

http://www.alasdairfr...
item.how_to_find_us: meet in lobby at 5:10 will wear the bw scarf with piano keys
item.name: Alasdair Fraser and Natalie Haas
